result.arabic_text: ۞ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ فَالِقُ ٱلۡحَبِّ وَٱلنَّوَىٰۖ يُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡحَيَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمَيِّتِ وَمُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡمَيِّتِ مِنَ ٱلۡحَيِّۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤۡفَكُونَ
result.translation: 95.Diggah Yalli Amboytaa kee Tamri Lafoyta baxsaah coox как yayyaaqe, Usuk Rabteemik Nuwwam yayyaaqeeh Rabtem Nuwwaamak yayyaaqi kinnik, toh Yallay Qibaada cakkisita kinnik toysa cakkik deedal fanah mannal kelittaanaa? Kaak kalihim taqbuden waqdi.
